conbody.p: When acquiring information technology services, solicitations must not describe any minimum experience or educational requirement for proposed contractor personnel unless the contracting officer determines that the needs of the agency-

li.p: (a) Cannot be met without that requirement; or
(b) Require the use of other than a performance-based acquisition (see subpartÂ 37.6).
